.xterm-rows div span, 
.formBox div p, 
blockquote, blockquote b, blockquote p, 
.sourceLine, 
#code_JUT ol li,
pre.r a, 
pre, pre span, li span, pre.rsplus, pre b, 
/*tbody tr td span,*/ 
tbody tr td, 
.line, 
.example_code, 
.container div code, 
.codeMirrors, 
.cm-variable, 
.ace_line span, .ace_line,

.blob-code, .blob-code span, .blob-num, 
code.r, .r.plain, .r.functions, .r.string, .r.keyword, 
code.plain, code.functions, code.string, code.keyword, code.spaces, code.value,   
code span, /*stackoverflow.com*/
code span a, 
code, kbd, samp, var {
    font-family: "Anonymous Pro", "WenQuanYi Micro Hei", monospace !important;
    font-size:100%;
}

h2::after{content:"";position:absolute;margin-top:20px;left:16px;width:24px;height:2px;background-color:var(--darker) !important}#statusio_history_timeline .timelineContainer .timelineMinor dt{background:none}#statusio_history_timeline .timelineContainer .timelineMinor dt .closed,#statusio_history_timeline .timelineContainer .timelineMinor dt .open{color:var(--lighter) !important}#statusio_history_timeline .timelineContainer .timelineMinor dt::before{content:"";position:absolute;margin-top:20px;left:0;width:12px;height:2px;background-color:var(--darker) !important}#statusio_history_timeline .timelineContainer hr{background-color:var(--darker) !important}.label-success{color:var(--light) !important;background-color:var(--green) !important}.label-info{color:var(--light) !important;background-color:var(--blue) !important}.make_round{border-radius:var(--radius)}.make_round.make_round_bottom_only{border-radius:0 0 var(--radius) var(--radius)}.make_round.panel-heading{border-radius:var(--radius) var(--radius) 0 0}.component_first{border-radius:var(--radius) var(--radius) 0 0}.component_last{border-radius:0 0 var(--radius) var(--radius)}#bottom_menu a{color:var(--accent) !important}#bottom_menu strong a{text-decoration:underline}

body{background:none !important}body .wrapper > img.bg{opacity:0}.white-box{border-radius:var(--radius);border:1px solid;color:var(--light) !important;border-color:var(--darker) !important;background-color:var(--dark) !important}.white-box a{color:var(--accent) !important}.white-box .text-switch{color:var(--lighter) !important}.white-box .switch .cmn-toggle-round + label{background-color:var(--darker) !important}.white-box .switch .cmn-toggle-round + label::after{background-color:var(--darker) !important}.white-box .switch .cmn-toggle-round + label::before{background-color:var(--dark) !important}.white-box .switch .cmn-toggle-round:checked + label::before{background-color:var(--blue) !important}.footer a{color:var(--light) !important}
